news.text: Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo are the only two players who have won the award more than three times...

news.headlines: 'Arsenal 2021-22 kit: New home and away jersey styles & release dates'
news.text: Goal takes a look at what the Gunners' latest home, away and third kits are rumoured to look like

news.headlines: 'Barcelona suspect Real Madrid are behind Moriba stalling on new contract'
news.text: The Blaugrana are struggling to put fresh terms in place with a hot prospect, but contact with the Blancos is being denied

news.headlines: 'Sarr 'surprised' that Chelsea wanted to sign him as he looks to make Blues breakthrough'
news.text: The 22-year-old defender attracted plenty of interest in the summer of 2020, but a switch to Stamford Bridge still came as a shock

news.headlines: 'Sudeikis wears t-shirt in support of Rashford, Sancho & Saka at Ted Lasso premiere'
news.text: The lead actor called the racist abuse of the players after their penalty misses in the Euro final 'horrible'

news.headlines: 'The final agreement insults club members' - East Bengal Executive Committee will not sign final agreement'
news.text: The committee maintain their stance on not signing final agreement of the JV which was to be formed between East Bengal and Shree Cement...

news.headlines: '‘The USWNT should not lose’ - Hope Solo previews the 2020 Olympic Games and reflects on controversy at Rio 2016'
news.text: The U.S. women’s national team legend was speaking on Goal’s new podcast, All Of US: The U.S. Women's Soccer Show

news.headlines: 'Celtic sign Japan international Kyogo Furuhashi from Vissel Kobe'
news.text: The winger has been in great form for Vissel Kobe and tops the goal charts in Japan at the midway point of the season

news.headlines: 'STEVEN GERRARD GIVES EX-LIVERPOOL TEAM-MATE GLOWING REFERENCE TO SEAL EURO MOVE'
news.text: Former Rangers defender Jon Flanagan has signed for Danish side HB Koge on a two-year deal, 12 months after leaving Ibrox, and a glowing reference from Ibrox boss Steven Gerrard – via former Liverpool star Daniel Agger – helped the full-back land the move.

news.headlines: 'Danish club reject Barnsley's N350m bid for ex-Manchester United winger of Nigerian descent'
news.text: The offer worth £500,000 (approximately N350 million in Nigerian currency) was rejected by Randers because it did not meet their valuation of the 2019 Nigeria U23 invitee.

news.headlines: 'Brentford-bound midfielder Onyeka finally shows up for FCM training ahead of season opener'
news.text: Frank Onyeka has finally reported for training at Danish Superliga club FC Midtjylland, a day before their first competitive match of the new season against Odense Boldklub.

news.headlines: 'Liel Abada: New Celtic signing revels in 'dream' switch from Israel'
news.text: The 19-year-old signed a five-year deal on Thursday, leaving Maccabi Petah Tikva in his homeland for an undisclosed fee.

news.headlines: 'Scottish League Cup: Dundee United put six past Elgin as Motherwell and Arbroath also win'
news.text: Dundee United stormed to the top of their Scottish League Cup section with a 6-1 thumping of Elgin City.

news.headlines: 'Leigh Griffiths: Police say 'no criminality' over Celtic's striker's online messages to teenage girls'
news.text: Celtic striker Leigh Griffiths has been cleared of criminality over alleged inappropriate social media messages to teenage girls.
